seo.page_title: #1 Lead Generation Agency | 25,000+ Leads Generated | AI + Paid Ads
seo.meta_description: Top-rated lead generation agency driving 3-5x ROI for small businesses. Expert Facebook & Google Ads management + AI automation. 15-25% conversion rates. Multi-channel strategy. Free consultation.
seo.h1_heading: Lead Generation Agency Trusted by 1,000+ Businesses Nationwide

hero.headline: Stop Chasing Leads. Start Attracting Qualified Customers.
hero.subheadline: Full-service lead generation combining AI automation with expert Facebook and Google Ads management to fill your pipeline with ready-to-buy customers.

intro.paragraph: Small business owners spend countless hours chasing unqualified leads instead of closing deals. As a leading lead generation agency, we've generated over 25,000+ qualified leads and driven $10+ million in revenue for businesses like yours. Our proven system combines cutting-edge AI voice technology with expert Facebook and Google Ads management to generate a consistent flow of qualified leads 24/7. We don't just drive traffic—we capture leads, qualify them automatically with AI, and deliver appointment-ready prospects directly to your sales team. Businesses working with our agency see 3x more qualified leads within 60 days, 15-25% conversion rates, and ROI averaging 400%. Our multi-channel approach includes Google Search Ads for high-intent buyers, Facebook Ads for building awareness, AI-powered lead qualification, conversion-optimized landing pages, and automated nurturing sequences. With 15+ years of combined expertise and proven strategies across 15+ industries, we're the lead generation agency that delivers measurable results, not just promises.

faq.question: What makes your lead generation agency different from competitors?
faq.answer: We combine proven paid advertising expertise (Google Ads, Facebook Ads) with cutting-edge AI voice technology for 24/7 lead qualification. Most agencies only drive traffic—we capture, qualify, and deliver appointment-ready prospects. Our clients see 3-5x ROI with 15-25% conversion rates, significantly higher than industry averages. Plus, we offer complete transparency with real-time dashboards and month-to-month contracts.

faq.question: How much does your lead generation agency cost?
faq.answer: Packages start at $97 per month for management services, plus your ad spend budget ($1,000-$5,000/month depending on goals). Most businesses see 3-5x ROI within 60-90 days, making it a highly profitable investment. We provide custom quotes during your free strategy call based on your industry, market, and growth goals.

faq.question: How quickly can I start generating leads?
faq.answer: Most businesses start generating leads within 7-14 days of launch. We complete campaign setup, landing page creation, and AI voice agent training within 1-2 weeks from initial consultation. Optimal performance develops over 30-60 days as we gather data and continuously optimize targeting, messaging, and bidding strategies.

faq.question: What industries does your lead generation agency serve?
faq.answer: We specialize in service-based businesses including Home Services (HVAC, plumbing, electrical), Healthcare (dental, medical practices), Legal Services, Financial Services, B2B Professional Services, Real Estate, and more. We've generated 25,000+ leads across 15+ industries with proven playbooks for each vertical.

faq.question: What kind of results can I expect from your agency?
faq.answer: Most businesses see 2-3x more leads, 15-25% conversion rates from click to appointment, and 3-5x ROI within the first 90 days. Our average client generates 50+ qualified leads monthly. For example, a $3,000/month investment typically generates $9,000-$15,000+ in revenue. Results vary by industry, market competition, and ad spend.

faq.question: Do you require long-term contracts?
faq.answer: No long-term contracts required. We offer month-to-month service with 30-day cancellation notice because we're confident in our results. However, we recommend at least 90 days for optimal campaign performance and data gathering.

faq.question: How do you qualify leads automatically?
faq.answer: Our AI voice agents answer calls 24/7, ask qualifying questions based on your criteria, assess prospect fit, and book appointments directly into your calendar. This ensures only high-intent, qualified prospects reach your sales team. Our multi-step qualification process achieves 15-25% lead-to-customer conversion rates.

faq.question: What's included in your lead generation agency services?
faq.answer: Complete end-to-end service: free strategy consultation, competitor analysis, keyword research, Google Ads campaign setup and management, Facebook/Instagram Ads campaigns, conversion-optimized landing pages, AI voice agent setup, lead nurturing sequences, CRM integration, real-time reporting dashboards, and ongoing optimization. You get a dedicated account manager and full transparency into campaign performance.

faq.question: How do you ensure high-quality leads?
faq.answer: We use advanced audience targeting, negative keyword filtering, AI-powered lead scoring, and multi-step qualification. Our campaigns target high-intent prospects actively searching for your services. Plus, our AI voice agents qualify every lead before booking appointments, ensuring your sales team only talks to ready-to-buy customers.

faq.question: Can I track my lead generation ROI in real-time?
faq.answer: Yes! We provide real-time dashboards showing campaign performance, cost per lead, conversion rates, revenue attribution, and ROI. You'll see exactly where every dollar goes and which campaigns drive the best results. Monthly reports include detailed analytics and optimization recommendations.
